text: Se fruma wæs þæt mon forstæl ænne wimman æt Ieceslea ælfsige Byrhsiges suna.
Þurwif hatte se wimman.
Þa befeng ælfsige þone mann æt Wulfstane Wulfgares fæder.
Þa tymde Wulfstan hine to æþelstane æt Sunnanbyrg.
Þa cende he tem & let þone forberstan & forbeh þone andagan.
Æfter þam bæd ælfsige ægiftes his mannes & he hine agef & forgeald him mid twam pundum.
Þa bæd Byrhferð ealdormann æþelstan hys wer for þam tembyrste.
Þa cwæð æðelstan þæt he næfde him to syllanne.
Þa cleopode Eadweard æðelstanes broðor & cwæð, ic hæbbe Sunnanburges boc ðe uncre yldran me læfdon, Læt me þæt land to handa ic agife þinne wer ðam cynge.
Þa cwæð æðelstan þæt him leofre wære þæt hit to fyre oððe flode gewurde þonne he hit æfre gebide.
Ða cwæð eadweard, hit is wyrse þæt uncer naðor hit næbbe.
Þa wæs þæt swa.
& forbead Byrhferð þæt land æðelstane & he of ferde & gebeh under Wulfgare æt Norðhealum.
Binnan ðam wendun gewyrda & gewat Eadræd cyng & feng Eadwig to rice.
& wende æðelstan hine eft into Sunnanbyrg ungebetra þinga.
Þa geahsode þæt Eadwig cyng & gesealde þæt land Byrnrice & he feng to & wearp æðelstan ut.
Gemang þam getidde þæt Myrce gecuran Eadgar to cynge & him anweald gesealdan ealra cynerihta.
Þa gesohte Æðelstan Eadgar cyng & bæd domes.
Þa ætdemdon him Myrcna witan land buton he his wer agulde þam cynge swa he oðrum ær sceolde.
Þa næfde he hwanon ne he hit Eadwearde his breðer geðafian nolde.
Þa gesealde se cyng & gebecte þæt land æðelstane ealdormenn to hæbbenne & to syllanne for life & for legere þam him leofost wære.
Æfter þam getidde þæt Ecgferð gebohte boc & land æt æðelstane ealdormenn on cynges gewitnesse & his witena swa his gemedo wæron hæfde & breac oð his ende.
Þa betæhte Ecgferð on halre tungan land & boc on cynges gewitnesse Dunstane arcebisceope to mundgenne his lafe & his bearne.
Þa he geendod wæs þa rad se bisceop to þam cynge myngude þære munde & his gewitnesse.
Þa cwæð se cyng him to andsware, mine witan habbað ætrecð Ecgferðe ealle his are þurh þæt swyrd þe him on hype hangode þa he adranc.
Nam þa se cyng ða are þe he ahteXXhyda æt SendanXæt Sunnanbyrg, & forgef ælfhege ealdormenn.
Þa bead se bisceop his wer þam cynge.
Þa cwæð se cyng, þæt mihte beon geboden him wið clænum legere ac ic hæbbe ealle þa spæce to ælfhege læten.
Þæs on syxtan gere gebohte se arcebisceop æt ælfhege ealdormenn þæt land æt Sendan midXCpundum & æt Sunnanbyrg midCCmancussan goldes unbecwedene & unforbodene wið ælcne mann to þære dægtide.
& he him swa þa land geagnian derr swa him se sealde ðe to syllenne ahte & hi þam se cyng sealde swa hi him his witan gerehton.
